TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit RegistryPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class RegistryPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class RegistryPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type RegistryPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制存取登錄變數的能力。

span.span: Controls the ability to access registry variables.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 描述登錄變數上的受保護的作業。describes protected operations on registry variables. 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 如果登錄物件傳遞至不受信任的呼叫端可能會誤用。If the registry object is passed to an untrusted caller it can be misused. 允許的登錄的存取類型由定義。The allowed registry access types are defined by . 如果想要使用多個類型的存取權，他們可以結合使用位元 OR 運算，如下列程式碼範例所示中所示。If more than one type of access is desired, they can be combined using the bitwise OR operation as shown in the code sample that follows. 登錄權限的定義是根據標準的絕對路徑;使用標準的路徑名稱，應該一律會進行檢查。Registry permission is defined in terms of canonical absolute paths; checks should always be made with canonical pathnames. 金鑰存取權限表示它所包含的所有值和其下的所有變數存取權。Key access implies access to all values it contains and all variables under it. > [!NOTE] > 在之前的.NET Framework 的版本中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，您可以使用方法，以防止意外存取系統資源受信任的程式碼。In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code. 現已淘汰，並存取資源現在僅取決於授與的權限集合組件。is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly. 若要限制檔案的存取權，您必須在沙箱中執行部分信任程式碼，並將指派給它的權限的程式碼可以存取的資源。To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access. 如需在沙箱中執行的應用程式的資訊，請參閱[How to:在沙箱中執行部分信任的程式碼](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)中所述。For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md).

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with either fully restricted or unrestricted permission as specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會建立完全受限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`登錄變數存取。Creates either fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` access to registry variables. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. summary.span: 使用指定登錄變數的指定存取，來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified access to the specified registry variables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式只允許其中指定的值。This constructor allows only one of the values to be specified. 此存取權會套用至所有列出的登錄變數。This access applies to all listed registry variables. 使用來定義更複雜的權限。Use to define more complicated permissions. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. summary.span: 使用指定登錄變數的指定存取和登錄控制資訊的指定存取權限，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified access to the specified registry variables and the specified access rights to registry control information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式只允許其中指定的值。This constructor allows only one of the values to be specified. 此存取權會套用至所有列出的登錄變數。This access applies to all listed registry variables. 使用來定義更複雜的權限。Use to define more complicated permissions. `control`參數會指定是否的存取控制清單 (ACL) 所指定的登錄機碼`pathList`可以變更，檢視，或無法存取。The `control` parameter specifies whether the access control list (ACL) for the registry keys specified by `pathList` can be changed, viewed, or cannot be accessed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 存取控制清單 (ACL) 會描述個人或群組，或沒有，在指定的登錄機碼上採取特定動作的權限。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the specified registry keys. 變更或檢視 ACL 的能力是很重要的權限，並應謹慎使用授與。The ability to change or view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

exception.span: 參數不是有效的 值。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid value of .
-or-
The parameter is not a valid string.

summary.span: 將指定登錄變數的存取權加入此權限的現有狀態。

span.span: Adds access for the specified registry variables to the existing state of the permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來修改登錄變數存取將其路徑的集合加入至目前的使用權限物件的狀態。Use this method to modify access to registry variables by adding the set of their paths to the state of the current permission object.

summary.span: 將指定登錄變數的存取加入至現有的使用權限狀態，指定登錄使用權限存取與存取控制動作。

span.span: Adds access for the specified registry variables to the existing state of the permission, specifying registry permission access and access control actions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來修改登錄變數存取將其路徑的集合加入至目前的使用權限物件的狀態。Use this method to modify access to registry variables by adding the set of their paths to the state of the current permission object. 這個多載可讓您指定的存取控制動作也會為登錄權限的存取。This overload allows you to specify the access control action as will as the registry permission access. `control`參數會指定是否的存取控制清單 (ACL) 所指定的登錄機碼`pathList`可以變更，檢視，或無法存取。The `control` parameter specifies whether the access control list (ACL) for the registry keys specified by `pathList` can be changed, viewed, or cannot be accessed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 存取控制清單 (ACL) 會描述個人或群組，或沒有，在指定的登錄機碼上採取特定動作的權限。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the specified registry keys. 變更或檢視 ACL 的能力是很重要的權限，並應謹慎使用授與。The ability to change or view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

exception.span: 參數不是有效的 值。

Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，這個新權限就是 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會說明兩者所共同描述的作業集合的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求將會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前權限屬於不同的類型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: (如果目前權限是所指定權限的子集)；否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的使用權限會指定一組完全包含在指定的權限的作業，目前的使用權限是指定的權限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示 C:\example.txt 的存取權限是 c： 表示存取權限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前權限屬於不同的類型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不受限制的權限，表示存取權限所保護的所有資源。An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission other) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (other As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: other
param.span: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是代表的權限表示的所有作業的目前權限和指定的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何通過其中之一權限的需求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前權限屬於不同的類型。
